channel.title: Serendipitous Oulipo Haiku
channel.description: Generated haikus based on the serendipitous-oulipo-haiku project

item.title: so, obviously
item.description:
so, obviously
you peek over the grapes to
absolute beauty

item.title: play brings character
item.description:
play brings character
I see you and your colors
glorious — alone

item.title: winter sun gives hints
item.description:
winter sun gives hints
to the heights that you take wing
to start to become

item.title: even the strongest
item.description:
even the strongest
to a gratitude’s ocean
paths, trails of wonder

item.title: you ensure the life
item.description:
you ensure the life
break free from these tangled limbs
of growth and decay

item.title: sometimes luminance
item.description:
sometimes luminance
there’s hundreds of finish lines
a vibrant puddle

item.title: you were in my hands
item.description:
you were in my hands
the dunes of me — parallel
brightening shadows

item.title: coding with patterns
item.description:
coding with patterns
are but loops in the garment
of an inner light

item.title: ink can be messy
item.description:
ink can be messy
come to hold my hand, farewell
charcoal to paper

item.title: somehow blooms do form
item.description:
somehow blooms do form
found in every little
drops encompass me

item.title: this path is flooded
item.description:
this path is flooded
to truly reflect on you
when you get to peak

item.title: sometimes luminance
item.description:
sometimes luminance
for being steadfast, constant
of your consciousness

item.title: autumn calls us all
item.description:
autumn calls us all
on dead branches among clouds
of growth beneath soil

item.title: when I banished you
item.description:
when I banished you
silences itself only
view of this wonder

item.title: what seems like chaos
item.description:
what seems like chaos
place them in your mind’s pocket
living in circles

item.title: a Fermat spiral
item.description:
a Fermat spiral
with strokes of grass and azure
beauty in my home

item.title: I treat my tea bag
item.description:
I treat my tea bag
plant me beside, beneath one
our reality

item.title: there is a pulse here
item.description:
there is a pulse here
will still have footsteps of light
to be a focus

item.title: my orchid’s face me
item.description:
my orchid’s face me
a thousand poems of you
leap up to kiss sky

item.title: the sea leaves presents
item.description:
the sea leaves presents
I fly with all of them that
that stands still and dark

item.title: be the blank canvas
item.description:
be the blank canvas
get lost in thought and dream big
a precious orchid

item.title: grab the sky and loam
item.description:
grab the sky and loam
orchid blooming for a year
only roots remain

item.title: swimming in a sea
item.description:
swimming in a sea
has become an impetus
places for quiet

item.title: the currents of geese
item.description:
the currents of geese
immersing in the moment
drops encompass me

item.title: oh, oyster catcher
item.description:
oh, oyster catcher
gulping berries at sun set
reflect and renew

item.title: “it’s the hill your on”
item.description:
“it’s the hill your on”
swiftly move with such volume
together a seed

item.title: you gather yourself
item.description:
you gather yourself
in the rain beneath this sky
shoot; despite ourselves

item.title: do you ever just
item.description:
do you ever just
my precious chickadee-dee
in this existence

item.title: I feel all the strands
item.description:
I feel all the strands
closest to the sun today
one drop fills my soul

item.title: brace yourself here; now
item.description:
brace yourself here; now
lead you to the horizon
and create you own

item.title: long shadows pull me
item.description:
long shadows pull me
that provide us with brilliance
joyfully alive

item.title: as you look down here
item.description:
as you look down here
changing, growing, condensing
puddle of raindrops

item.title: I breath in and out
item.description:
I breath in and out
so they could all see this bird
at the oceans breath

item.title: in my cup, coffee
item.description:
in my cup, coffee
lift into the sky above
breath in this wildwood

item.title: like the heat bubble
item.description:
like the heat bubble
together, watching the birds
with your fluff and stance

item.title: a new path is found
item.description:
a new path is found
together in flight and tree
iota of life

item.title: I picture myself
item.description:
I picture myself
from life that I did not know
little chickadee

item.title: your life has texture
item.description:
your life has texture
moments learning the flowers
absolute beauty

item.title: do we flock like Boids?
item.description:
do we flock like Boids?
I fly with all of them that
positive? a shift

item.title: what seems like chaos
item.description:
what seems like chaos
infinite, ever-changing
beauty does abound

item.title: let yourself be here
item.description:
let yourself be here
of all in the past/future
of another Earth

item.title: oh, yes, this is it!
item.description:
oh, yes, this is it!
to run, prance through life’s meadows,
yet, still tread lightly

item.title: even in our death
item.description:
even in our death
before you can grow; anew
Pisano petals

item.title: I found you — fallen
item.description:
I found you — fallen
flow through the ocean of sky
beyond what we grasp

item.title: hello my deer friend
item.description:
hello my deer friend
earlier now. Lets us know
to bridge within you

item.title: the fractals of us
item.description:
the fractals of us
with strokes of grass and azure
warmth from radiance

item.title: gossamer catches
item.description:
gossamer catches
creative, curious, joy
vivid silouettes

item.title: on a walkabout
item.description:
on a walkabout
generations green and full
hundreds of years old

item.title: do we flock like Boids?
item.description:
do we flock like Boids?
of flight above all of it
that small piece of moss

item.title: at the tops of hills
item.description:
at the tops of hills
arcs of me, of time — being
an aerie of grace

item.title: do we flock like Boids?
item.description:
do we flock like Boids?
that surrounds us all, will grow
of another Earth

item.title: I breathed alder air
item.description:
I breathed alder air
together in solitude
to keep it secure

item.title: we run the same paths
item.description:
we run the same paths
quivering with their cuteness
heaven and the Earth

item.title: plot the Devil’s Curve
item.description:
plot the Devil’s Curve
that make you feel like you’re on
in the winter sun

item.title: so, obviously
item.description:
so, obviously
it was always here — ready
to be here and now

item.title: I hugged my mother
item.description:
I hugged my mother
lead you to the horizon
of that great distance

item.title: you asked permission
item.description:
you asked permission
with the magnitude of life
in the winter sun

item.title: the outline of death
item.description:
the outline of death
the silhouettes that reveal
I have passed this past

item.title: unfold at sunrise
item.description:
unfold at sunrise
but drops — collecting, dripping
are manifested

item.title: dynamic systems
item.description:
dynamic systems
and find they are but water
beautiful — complex

item.title: you reach for the moon
item.description:
you reach for the moon
I see you and your colors
I awake in grace

item.title: light offers shadows
item.description:
light offers shadows
in the cracks beneath my feet
no matter the seas

item.title: when is it, you ask
item.description:
when is it, you ask
vector fields of stick and cloth
trailing a mother

item.title: sometimes you just run
item.description:
sometimes you just run
lift into the sky above
at your ocean’s edge

item.title: lofty sequoia
item.description:
lofty sequoia
release the grip that it has
of what surrounds you

item.title: vestiges of trees
item.description:
vestiges of trees
we may spring forth foliage
listening to birds

item.title: you are potential
item.description:
you are potential
perfect, beautiful flowers
cobbles at high tide

item.title: and when you suffer
item.description:
and when you suffer
that you store your quietness
is there really up?

item.title: this hug was intense
item.description:
this hug was intense
seize those moments that make you
ruffles in our time

item.title: beauty in my mind
item.description:
beauty in my mind
for the hidden forest doors
as the darkness came

item.title: repose beneath sky
item.description:
repose beneath sky
of flight above all of it
the awe of it all

item.title: I am condensate
item.description:
I am condensate
will still have footsteps of light
of branches and roots

item.title: in just one moment
item.description:
in just one moment
together like wolves that howl
ready to unfurl

item.title: the base of thirteen
item.description:
the base of thirteen
reflecting from this good earth
into me, not me

item.title: we all can transform
item.description:
we all can transform
turbulence with breath, movement
remember the sky

item.title: oh, yes, this is it!
item.description:
oh, yes, this is it!
may bring forth fruits beyond us
a precious orchid

item.title: black, soft, powder stick
item.description:
black, soft, powder stick
chaotic origami
parametric us

item.title: a forest burned shows
item.description:
a forest burned shows
the raw transforms to beauty
of branches and roots

item.title: when you turn in a
item.description:
when you turn in a
so you can hear the whispers
of this universe

item.title: in my cup, coffee
item.description:
in my cup, coffee
brings us through our existence
astonishing — bloom

item.title: strands of life do hang
item.description:
strands of life do hang
lead you to this perspective
beneath your breath — “spring”

item.title: three-hundred-sixty
item.description:
three-hundred-sixty
dancing in erratic flight
earth and sky as one

item.title: your presence brings joy
item.description:
your presence brings joy
float away on gentle breeze
as pink fades to night

item.title: sunlight in canyons
item.description:
sunlight in canyons
are now weeks past their season
it is my function

item.title: there are these comets
item.description:
there are these comets
float away on gentle breeze
to dwell within me

item.title: oh my bald cypress
item.description:
oh my bald cypress
moments learning the flowers
heaven and the Earth

item.title: faint little circle
item.description:
faint little circle
you can be a single point
you just have to look

item.title: when you turn in a
item.description:
when you turn in a
lift into the sky above
manifest eddies

item.title: wind gusts bending trees
item.description:
wind gusts bending trees
below the grasses of thought
graphs of my being

item.title: sunlight in canyons
item.description:
sunlight in canyons
are but loops in the garment
a painted earful

item.title: hoya of Nana
item.description:
hoya of Nana
of flight above all of it
contrast is but life

item.title: I saw the sunrise
item.description:
I saw the sunrise
vibrato pierces the morn
calling you to dance

item.title: maybe all our days
item.description:
maybe all our days
that draw you in; and call you
thoughts wrapped around me

item.title: beauty in my mind
item.description:
beauty in my mind
to sit and watch little swifts
centuries of flow

item.title: you turn towards the light
item.description:
you turn towards the light
are now weeks past their season
while reflecting sky

item.title: when you submerge, keep
item.description:
when you submerge, keep
the same and yet different
earth and sky as one

item.title: there are these comets
item.description:
there are these comets
infinite, ever-changing
from a hidden world

item.title: could this day just be
item.description:
could this day just be
completely immerse yourself
lingers deep inside

item.title: a tender wave wafts
item.description:
a tender wave wafts
center on infinity
completing a proof

item.title: three generations
item.description:
three generations
little hummingbirds come, go.
modest are the trees

item.title: I stumbled upon
item.description:
I stumbled upon
plant me beside, beneath one
and staying aligned

item.title: I am condensate
item.description:
I am condensate
of moss, earth, stream, trees, and life
pareidolia

item.title: I know, even though
item.description:
I know, even though
I thought you might sit with me
in awe we exist

item.title: shadows stretch across
item.description:
shadows stretch across
gossamer laced water beads
and breath in this life

item.title: my luck dragon came
item.description:
my luck dragon came
blow through me and around me
of growth beneath soil

item.title: you gather to speak
item.description:
you gather to speak
I thought you might sit with me
bring us forth those pearls

item.title: I dream that you kiss
item.description:
I dream that you kiss
together like wolves that howl
into reminders

item.title: we all can transform
item.description:
we all can transform
like the sound of waves pulling
of my consciousness

item.title: I see you peeking
item.description:
I see you peeking
come and sit with me; this day
paths, trails of wonder

item.title: slough of quietude
item.description:
slough of quietude
shall we prance along this path
as the last leaves fall
